content:
INFORMATICS 41 • DAVID G. KAY • UC IRVINE

Video Lectures

Below are links to six short video lectures that provide more background on some topics we touched on in class.

Everyone is expected to watch these videos; the major points may show up on quizzes (starting with the second quiz on October 4). And don't hesitate to ask follow-up questions on any of these topics in class.

At present, these videos download to your computer, which may take a little while. Apparently our servers don't support streaming.

  • Laptops in the Classroom (6:46)

  • Six Characteristics of Software (12:16)

  • Natural and Formal Languages (7:51)

  • Why Study Programming (9:45)

  • Why Scheme (13:29)

  • Functional Programming (14:59)


David G. Kay, kay@uci.edu
Monday, September 26, 2011 12:43 PM
